SIDES | DESSERTS | DRINKS

INDY FRESH MEMORABLE SIDES

  • Fresh Baked Italian
    Bread

    Served with our signature roasted garlic and herb butter.

    15 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Garlic Mashed
    Potatoes

    Yukon gold potatoes and Amish butter.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Macaroni & Cheese

    Fresh shredded cheddar, cavatappi pasta, topped with toasted panko bread crumbs and parmesan cheese.

    30 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Spanish Rice Pilaf

    Roasted vegetables, cilantro, saffron.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)
DELI SIDES

  • 3 Bean Salad

    Garbanzo, black and kidney beans, sweet bell peppers, yellow onions, vine ripe tomatoes, cilantro in lemon herb dressing.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Pesto Penne

    Fresh basil pesto, mixed greens, olive oil, fresh penne.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Pasta Salad

    Tri-color rotini pasta, fresh mozzarella, sweet bell peppers, and Bermuda onion, mixed greens, lemon herb dressing.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Potato Chips

    A variety of kettle cooked chips.

    2 Each

  • German Potato Salad

    Yukon gold potatoes, boiled eggs, celery and onion, in creamy German mustard dressing.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Cucumber Tomato
    Salad

    Marinated vine ripe tomatoes, garden fresh cucumbers, Bermuda onions, feta cheese, and lemon herb dressing.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)
CLASSIC VEGETABLE SIDES

  • Traditional Green
    Beans

    Seasoned and cut green beans with bacon.

    20 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Side Salad

    Romaine lettuce or mixed greens, vine ripe tomatoes, cucumbers and choice of dressing.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Sautéed Vegetables

    Zucchini, yellow squash, and red peppers.

    30 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Steamed Vegetables

    Seasoned and buttered medley of broccoli florets, cauliflower and baby carrots.

    30 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Sautéed Green Beans

    Fresh green beans, red peppers, carrots and basil infused olive oil.

    30 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Creamy Coleslaw

    Fresh shredded cabbage, cilantro, green onion, creamy German mustard dressing.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Baked Beans

    Sweet and spicy organic beans slow roasted with ham hocks.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)
DESSERTS

  • Ghirardelli Brownies

    Famous Ghirardelli chocolate and cocoa baked fresh daily.

    10 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • New Orleans Bread Pudding

    Custard-soaked French baguette with rum caramel sauce.

    40 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Crème Brûlée

    Fresh vanilla bean custard and toasted Turbinado sugar.

    40 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Lady Kisses

    Hazelnut cookies layered with Italian dark chocolate.

    20 (Serves 8-10)
DRINKS

  • Tea

    Sweetend or unsweetend tea. Available by the gallon.

    5

  • Lemonade

    Lemonade available by the gallon.

    10

  • Coke Products

    Two Liters: Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite.

    3

  • Bottled Water

    16oz bottled water.

    1 Each
